name: Face Value
description:
This short puzzle game was created in the context of the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

The number of dots on top determines how far you move. Change the dot count of a side by stopping on a dot pickup.

Controls

Move: Arrow Keys / WASD
Restart Level: R
Pause Menu: ESC

Team

Moritz Roth: Lead, Coding, Game Design, Level Design, Testing, Sprites
Maximilian Krischan: Level Design, Game Design, Sprites, Testing
Christopher Catabiani: Level Design, Game Design, Sprites, Testing
Felix Kaubek: Game Design, Level Design
Tom Lautenbach: Modeling, Game Design

Known Issues

If the game runs super slow check if your browser has hardware acceleration disabled.
In level 9 the player is able to slide over some gaps that they should not be able to slide across.
